name: Archibald
description:
Far-far away in the kingdom of Glassland in the capital of Crystal City is ruled by the evil King Glass.

He imposed all his subjects with excessive taxes, but this was not enough.

Glass vassals, using their power on the ground, collected additional taxes from the already poor population

But there was a savior.
The great warrior Archibald challenged Glass and now his mission is to walk to the Crystal City, defeating all the vassals of the king.


  • Realistic physics
  • 30 unique levels of varying difficulty
  • Atmospheric soundtrack
